name: Now You See
description:
NOW YOU SEE is a hand painted horror adventure game, played in first-person perspective.STORY
Whilst travelling in the dead of night on foot through unfamiliar farmlands, a heavy thunderstorm begins crashing above you. After some time and distance battling the hail and winds in dark and slippery conditions, you are desperate to seek some shelter. You notice the dark silhouette of a lone residence on the horizon. Heading in that direction you hold hope that the occupants are friendly and will allow you stay until first light, or at least until the storm has passed. Eventually you reach the house and knock the front door. There is no answer, but you hear the faint sound of music coming from inside. You knock again... nothing. Rain and hail is stinging your face and fingers like daggers now. You grip the cold handle and twist. The door creaks open and you step inside...FEATURES
  • Classic Point & Click adventure, played in first-person perspective.
  • Grisly hand painted 2D art.
  • Disturbingly voiced characters.
  • Fiendish puzzles and a full inventory system.
  • Lashings of atmosphere and gore.
  • Unfold a dark story about ritual, blood and survival.
  • Use your wits to escape this immersive nightmare.
